name: 邱志洲
objective: 本課程教授之內容將著重在行銷領域上各種分析工具的實際運用。這些分析工具包括傳統統計分析技術：集群分析、區別分析、鑑別分析、因素分析、、聯合分析、羅吉斯迴歸鑑別、人工智慧方法、決策樹等方法。
schedule:
1 Overview　　
2 Introduction to Bayesian analysis, 
  the R statistical package, regression analysis.　　
  Homework #1: Regression analysis
3 Bayesian regression, Markov chains, 
  random number generation　　
  Homework #2: Bayesian regression, ordinal restrictions
4 Censored regression models, 
  data augmentation, conditional independence, identification  
  Homework #3: Binary probit model, ordinal probit model
5 Metropolis-Hastings algorithm, logit model　　
  Homework #4: Logit model estimation, comparison to probit, 
  imposing ordinal constraints in a logit model.
6 Heterogeneity, Wishart distribution, hierarchical models 
  Homework #5: Heterogeneous probit model and logit model.
7 Midterm　　
8-12 Paper Study and Presentation　　
  8 papers from Mkareting Science or JMR
13 Properties of Discrete Choice Models; 
   Kenneth E. Train (ppt)
14 Advantages and Limitations of Logit　　
   Kenneth E. Train (ppt)
15 Numerical Maximization+Probit　　
   Kenneth E. Train (ppt)
16 Estimation with Simulation　　
   Kenneth E. Train (ppt)
17 Hierarchical Bayes　　 
   Kenneth E. Train (ppt)
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homeworks   50%(=5*10%)
Midterm     20%
Final Exam  20%
Paper Presentation and Report  10%(=5*2%)
materials:
TEXTBOOK:
Bayesian Statistics and Marketing by Peter E. Rossi, Greg Allenby, and Rob McCulloch, John Wiley and Sons, December 2005

REFERENCES
Discrete Choice Methods with Simulation by Kenneth Train,  Cambridge University Press, 2003
